landingPage.subtitle: Enhance your teaching with ReflectEdâ€” a tool for collecting instant feedback on lessons and gaining valuable insights to refine your teaching strategies.
landingPage.qrFeedbackDescription: QR codes for instant feedback collection make the process seamless and efficient.
landingPage.feedbackStatisticsDescription: Access insightful feedback statistics to analyze and improve teaching outcomes.
landingPage.anonymousFeedbackDescription: Encourage honest and constructive feedback by allowing anonymity for respondents.
landingPage.courseCreationDescription: Easily create comprehensive courses, organizing your teaching material effectively.
